articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Biden to ask Americans to wear masks for 100 days
articles.description: The president-elect says he expects universal masking will bring a "significant reduction" in Covid-19.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Covid-19: Fauci says UK vaccine will 'do really well'
articles.description: The US expert apologised for remarks that seemed to criticise the UK's vaccine approval process.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: French Thalys train attacker 'tried to kill me three times'
articles.description: American Spencer Stone tells a French court how he tackled the gunman on the Thalys train in 2015.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Moment plane lands on highway
articles.description: A light aircraft is forced to make an emergency landing on an interstate in Minnesota, but no injuries are reported.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Timnit Gebru: Google staff rally behind fired AI researcher
articles.description: Timnit Gebru, a critic of some of the firm's policies, says she was dismissed over an internal email.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Time Kid of the Year Gitanjali Rao aims to ‘solve world’s problems’
articles.description: Gitanjali Rao, 15, says she proves that you don't have to look like a "typical scientist".

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Brexit: ‘Breakthrough still possible’ as UK-EU trade talks resume
articles.description: Brexit talks are to resume on Friday as compromises over issues such as fishing rights are sought.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Suspected Hollywood 'Con Queen' arrested in UK
articles.description: He is accused of swindling money out of aspiring stars by impersonating Hollywood executives.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Germany to wipe Nazi traces from phonetic alphabet
articles.description: The Nazis removed Jewish names from the German phonetic alphabet - now a reform is coming.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: China is greatest threat to freedom - US intelligence chief
articles.description: Beijing seeks to dominate the world, warns US intelligence director John Ratcliffe.
